User's objects's DAO interface. Provides functionality to obtain user's info data model. Inherited from IEntityDAO. More...

Detailed Description

User's objects's DAO interface. Provides functionality to obtain user's info data model. Inherited from IEntityDAO.

See also:
dropsend::data::dao::IEntityDAO
